title: ADRA calls for humane response to refugee crisis in Europe (Seventh-day Adventist Church)
text: ( Source : Seventh-day Adventist Church ) Distribution in Hungary . [ Photo courtesy of ADRA International ] The humanitarian arm of the Seventh-day Adventist Church pledges solidarity with the refugees. October 14 , 2015 | Silver Spring ,
